title: Terms and Conditions
introduction: These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our ESG management software and services.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

sections.title: Description of Service
sections.content: We provide an ESG management software-as-a-service solution designed for businesses to track and report environmental, social, and governance metrics.

sections.title: User Obligations
sections.content: Users agree to provide accurate information and use the service for lawful purposes in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations.

sections.title: Intellectual Property Rights
sections.content: The software and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of our company and its licensors.

sections.title: Fees and Payment
sections.content: Fees for our services are billed on a subscription basis and must be paid in accordance with our billing terms.

sections.title: Privacy Policy
sections.content: User data is protected and handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: Our company shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages resulting from the use of our service.

sections.title: Termination
sections.content: We may terminate or suspend access to our service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms and Conditions.

sections.title: Changes to Terms
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. Your continued use of the service after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.

sections.title: Governing Law
sections.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is registered, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us.

effectiveDate: The effective date of these Terms and Conditions is [Insert Effective Date].
